catalog_webhook_price_updated._comment: Webhook event when product price changes

catalog_webhook_price_updated_no_sale._comment: Webhook event for regular price change without sale

catalog_webhook_availability_in_stock._comment: Webhook event when product comes back in stock

catalog_webhook_availability_out_of_stoc._comment: Webhook event when product goes out of stock

catalog_webhook_availability_preorder._comment: Webhook event for preorder availability with date

catalog_webhook_inventory_updated._comment: Webhook event when inventory quantity changes

catalog_webhook_inventory_low_stock._comment: Webhook event for low inventory warning

catalog_webhook_inventory_estimated._comment: Webhook event with estimated inventory quantity
